thread.title: U.S. Religious Freedom Envoy Criticizes Saudi Arabia, Myanmar

author: Jessica Donati
title: U.S. Religious Freedom Envoy Criticizes Saudi Arabia, Myanmar
text:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. envoy for international religious freedom, Sam Brownback, criticized key American ally Saudi Arabia and described the violence directed against Myanmar’s Muslim Rohingya minority as ethnic cleansing during the release of the State Department’s annual report on religious freedom on Tuesday.
During a news conference, Mr. Brownback also announced plans to hold a ministerial meeting for the first time in Washington, D.C., on July 25-26, to bring together “like-minded countries” to discuss ways to protect religious... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
